reviews.review_title: 2.5 times COSTLINER than equivalent grams of Rs. 10 Sachets
reviews.review_body: The coffee is good and 5 stars for that.The 1 star for the review because 245 for 100 grams. Whereas 9 gram Bru Gold sachets cost only 10Rs.So we get 100 Rs. for around Rs. 115.So the bottle is almost 2 times costlier. DO THE MATHS. Go to retail shop and check it out yourself!!
I had ordered a 100gm bottle and i received a 50gm bottle of bru gold coffee. The sticker attached by amazon says its 100gm but the bottle says its 50gms. Kindle issue a refund asap.

reviews.review_title: Best soluble coffee powder in India
reviews.review_body: I am a coffeeholic. I drink 8 to 10 cups of coffee everyday so I know everything about coffee. If you are a busy person like me you must be using soluble coffee powder. These are usually freeze-dried coffee powder made from fresh coffee beans. The Aroma and taste usually depends upon the beans you are using. Usually coffee beans are picked up from Tamilnadu. It is used in making this Bru coffee powder; Bru gold is it really fantastic I can't believe that it is of Indian Origin (better than arabica coffee beans which are imported from Africa, used in Nescafe gold which is highly over priced compared to its taste). These doesn't get solidified in humid environment like other brand powders or even it's standard Bru.Highly recommend (better than Nescafe gold)

After trying this coffee, I realized that I have been drinking garbage coffee till now in my life! Man! This coffee just tastes so awesome. There is so little bitterness. This coffee tastes so fantastic even without milk/creamer!! I have been drinking cheap nescafe till now that used to be bitter. Now I have got used to coffee and I'll order more of this. This is so reasonable in price too and way better than the readymade coffee sold in market.Note: Create froth with blender and Sprinkle chocolate powder on top for top class pleasure!!

reviews.review_title: Perfect coffee for anytime of the day / night
reviews.review_body: Well packed / good deal / good flavour / great colour/ good aroma/I have it in cold milk and cold water / it takes a little time to mix up at the bottom: so just stir it and let the cup sit for a few minutes it will mix betterThis is any day better in quality than the regular variantsDoesnâ€™t show any indication on label of added chicory which is a plus point.No chicory means no added sugars or carbs just plain pure coffeeGo for it .....

reviews.review_title: Bru se hoti hain khushiyan shuru
reviews.review_body: "chai garam, chai garam, chai garam"Chai toh bahut pee li ab coffee pi ke dekho! Aur already pite ho aur yahan coffee search karte hue aaye ho to theek jagah aaye ho. Mera personal opinion hai, Bru Gold coffee market Mein maujood doosre brands ki coffee se zyada achchi hai. Iski aroma, iska Taste aur flavour is just awesome. Leather wala froth formation, coffee jise peete hi energy aajaye.Aksar log tips dete hain ki coffee toned milk Mein banao, but mera suggestion iske opposite hai. Full cream milk ko achche se garam kar ke Phir coffee banao uske sath... Wo hi sabse mast coffee hogi.

reviews.review_title: Perfect.. But cannot say the same now
reviews.review_body: Nice Coffee to have every morning.. Expensive though but if you can get it at a discounted price its really worth.Quality deteriorated as compared to earlier purchase.. Will exercise caution before buying again

reviews.review_title: Damaged  bottles of BRU GOLD coffee-100gms each
reviews.review_body: Both the bottles of BRU GOLD-100 gms were found broken when opened. the first bottle was so badly damaged it had to be thrown out as the glass pieces could hurt anyone. when the second bottle was  unwrapped from its bubble plastic wrapping, both the top and bottom were cracked and the contents spilled out along with glass pieces. The second bottle has been saved for display.. This is the first time that such damages  were noticed in the last four years of regular purchases. either the bottles are replaced by good ones or arrange refund for the damaged bottles of Bru Gold coffee-100gms each.=T.R.Srinivasan
